alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 11 at 7:01PM PST until January 13 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Additional snowfall of up to 2 inches. Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 0 degrees to 5 below zero. * WHERE...Admiralty Inlet Area, including Port Townsend, Whidbey Island, and Camano Island. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight PST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 7 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue to taper off for Island County, and taper off into tonight for the Port Townsend area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
